Package io.sentry

Interface ISpan

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITransaction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoOpSpan, NoOpTransaction, SentryTracer, Span
    public interface ISpan
    Represents performance monitoring Span.
